response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I understand its value to you stands at $8,000. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $9,500. This price not only reflects the quality and value of the product but also allows us to maintain a fair transaction. I believe this is a mutually beneficial opportunity for both of us. Please let me know if this proposal suits your budget.", "product_price": 9500}
